trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_SEQ_00<tab>Uin Nee is concerned for the well-being of Il Mheg's most beloved species.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TODO_00<tab>Search for the suspicious character at Timh Gyeus.
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Uin Nee.
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_UINNEE_000_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, help! Il Mheg is being invaded!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_UINNEE_000_002<tab>Sort of. By “invaded,” I mean, a stranger has shown up and started chasing our porxies!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_UINNEE_000_003<tab>I wouldn't mind so much if it weren't for the fact our pets are supposed to be gathering flower seeds for use in dreams. Go and put a stop to this silliness, would you?
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_000_010<tab>One, two! One, two, three, four!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_100_010<tab>On an epic adventure, the intrepid hero is here!♪ A Fuath to be reckoned with, evildoers frozen in fear!♪ In the name of joy, he dances his merry jig!♪ Let none keep him from the enchanted flying pig!♪
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_000_011<tab>Oh, porxie, how do I love thee? Let me count the ways! But why must you always flee when I draw near? Why, I ask youuu!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_000_012<tab>Me, bothering the porxies!? Never!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_000_013<tab>The mere thought I could be causing them distress has left me quite flabbergasted! And to think they would spurn my affections...it is preposterous, I tell you!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_TALLFUATH_000_014<tab>I was merely passing through to trade with the Nu Mou when I saw their precious pink companions. That adorable snout, that curly tail... It was love at first sight! Wait for me, porxies!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_SCAVENGER_000_015<tab>No more, please! I'll leave Il Mheg and never come back, I swear!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_SCAVENGER_000_016<tab>Oh, you're not a faerie? Thank goodness.

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_SCAVENGER_000_017<tab>I was trying to catch one of those little flying pigs, for research purposes. But then I discovered that they're the faeries' creations. Even if I managed to get my hands on them, I'd never be able to take something so dangerous back to civilization!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_SCAVENGER_000_018<tab>And if the pixies find me, they'll turn me into one of those leafmen! It's high time I quit this godsforsaken place!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_FAKEMYSTEL_000_019<tab>Hello! I am a very rich lady from Eulmore! I expect you to <var 08 E905 ((curtsy)) ((bow)) /var> when greeting one of my standing!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_FAKEMYSTEL_000_020<tab>Ha ha! Just joking! I'm actually a pixie in disguise. Walking around like a mortal certainly makes a change from all that flitting about!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_FAKEMYSTEL_000_021<tab>Chasing porxies? Why, yes, as a matter of fact, I was. It's a bit hard to keep up with them, though. Perhaps I need some more practice with this “one foot in front of the other” business!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_FAKEMYSTEL_000_022<tab>And if the other pixies have a problem with me chasing those flappy-eared porkers, I could leave them alone, I suppose. After all, 'tis hardly fitting for a “lady” to engage in such unseemly behavior!

TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_UINNEE_000_030<tab>So I take it the porxies will be resuming their duties? Good. I won't let them shirk their responsibilities! Not even if they're cute and adorable and I want to squeeze them and squeeze them until... Gah!
TEXT_BANPIX115_03703_UINNEE_000_031<tab>No! I mustn't allow them to beguile me! I have a job to do! And for your part in...whatever this was, I'm making you an honorary “Protector of Porxies”!
